name: cordova-plugin-reteno
description: The Reteno Cordova Plugin for Mobile Customer Engagement and Analytics solutions
author: mobile-sdk@reteno.com

scripts.test: npm run test:ios && npm run test:android
scripts.test:android: bash ./test/test-default.sh 9.0.0 android 8.1.0 && bash ./test/test-with-3-plugins.sh 9.0.0 android 8.1.0 cordova-plugin-request-location-accuracy cordova-android-play-services-gradle-release cordova-android-reteno-gradle-release
